text: Ej ʙani Isroil, ʙa jod ored on vaqtro, ki ahdu pajmoni saxt giriftem, ki ƣajri Allohro naparasted va ʙa padaru modaru xesovandon va jatimonu darveson neki kuned va ʙa mardumon suxani nek gued va namoz ʙixoned va zakot ʙidihed! Sipas ruj gardonided va sarpeci karded, magar sumori andake az sumo
